sentences.en: " We owe the milkman sixty cents, " added Hurstwood.
sentences.cn: “ 我们还欠送牛奶的6毛钱, " 赫斯渥补充说.

sentences.en: Empty bottles chinked as the milkman put them into the crate.
sentences.cn: 送奶人把空瓶放进箱格时,瓶子发出咣啷咣啷的碰撞声.

sentences.en: Every day the milkman delivers milk to our house.
sentences.cn: 每天送牛奶的人都把牛奶送到我家.

sentences.en: First, can you tell me what time the milkman call?
sentences.cn: 首先, 请您告诉我送牛奶的人什么时候来?

sentences.en: Have you paid the milkman this month?
sentences.cn: 你这个月付款给送牛奶的人了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He pulls in quite a lot as a milkman.
sentences.cn: 他卖牛奶赚了相当多的钱.

sentences.en: I have paid the milkman this month.
sentences.cn: 我这个月付款给送奶人了.

sentences.en: Keep watch for the milkman. I want to pay him today.
sentences.cn: 帮我留意一下送牛奶的, 今天我要付钱给他.

sentences.en: She could tell the approach of the milkman by the whistled notes that somehow always flatted.
sentences.cn: 她能从那总是偏低的口哨声听出送奶人的到来.

sentences.en: The dishonest milkman added water to his milk.
sentences.cn: 这个不诚实的售奶人把水掺到牛奶里.

sentences.en: The milkman calls at seven - thirty every morning, regular as clockwork.
sentences.cn: 送奶人极有规律地在早晨7:30送来牛奶.

sentences.en: The milkman comes daily to our house.
sentences.cn: 送牛奶的每天都到我家来送奶.

sentences.en: The milkman selected the spotted cows, from among a herd of two hundred.
sentences.cn: 牛奶商从一群200头牛中选出有斑点的牛.

sentences.en: The milkman was late this morning.
sentences.cn: 送牛奶的人今晨来晚了.

sentences.en: The milkman was up before daylight.
sentences.cn: 天亮前送奶人就起床了.

words.tran_cn: 乳白色的；牛奶的；乳状的；柔和的；混浊不清的

trans.tran_en: someone in Britain whose job is to deliver milk to people’s houses each morning
